mapper.insert: insert into sys_user ( username, password, name, mobile, status, create_user_id, create_datetime ) values ( #{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{mobile}, 'normal', #{createUserId}, now() )
mapper.select: select if(count(1)=0,0,1) from sys_user a,sys_role b,api_info c,sys_role_api d where a.id = #{userId} and a.role_id=b.id and c.invoke_method=#{invokeMethod} and b.id=d.role_id and c.id=d.api_id
